title: What do you think
author: VD
content_html:
Now that I’m wrapping up “The Wrath of Angels”, I’m considering what to do next. Which of these sounds more interesting?

1. Media Whores: Courtesans and Charlatans of the American Commentariat

2. The Irrational Atheists: Richard Dawkins and the Clowns at Reason’s Court

3. A fantasy novel entitled “Dragonnaire” set in the same world as some of the short stories in “The Altar of Hate”.

4. The Chronicles of King David: David the Hero

Based on admittedly limited information, I could probably find a publisher for the second and third. The first and fourth would probably have to be self-published.
